List jobs in registry

registry_ls.Rd

Show all jobs stored in the registry with their status and metadata.

Usage

registry_ls(registry = NULL, pattern = NULL, limit = NULL)

Arguments

registry

Path to registry (default: use paths_get("registry"))

pattern

Optional pattern to filter job names

limit

Maximum number of jobs to show

Value

Data frame of jobs

Examples

# \donttest{
# List all jobs
registry_ls()
#>              name      status             created
#> 5 script-0d5edc86 NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 01:02:19
#> 7      slurm-call NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 01:02:19
#> 6 script-6f5494e8 NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 01:02:13
#> 1 parade-6ebd842a NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 00:42:58
#> 3 parade-c55f804b NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 00:42:55
#> 4 parade-d96baf1b NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 00:42:52
#> 2 parade-82f7518a NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 00:42:49
#>                                              path
#> 5 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/script-0d5edc86
#> 7      /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/slurm-call
#> 6 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/script-6f5494e8
#> 1 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/parade-6ebd842a
#> 3 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/parade-c55f804b
#> 4 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/parade-d96baf1b
#> 2 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/parade-82f7518a

# List jobs matching pattern
registry_ls(pattern = "analysis_*")
#> No jobs found in registry
#> [1] name    status  created
#> <0 rows> (or 0-length row.names)

# List most recent 10 jobs
registry_ls(limit = 10)
#>              name      status             created
#> 5 script-0d5edc86 NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 01:02:19
#> 7      slurm-call NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 01:02:19
#> 6 script-6f5494e8 NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 01:02:13
#> 1 parade-6ebd842a NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 00:42:58
#> 3 parade-c55f804b NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 00:42:55
#> 4 parade-d96baf1b NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 00:42:52
#> 2 parade-82f7518a NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-01 00:42:49
#>                                              path
#> 5 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/script-0d5edc86
#> 7      /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/slurm-call
#> 6 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/script-6f5494e8
#> 1 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/parade-6ebd842a
#> 3 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/parade-c55f804b
#> 4 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/parade-d96baf1b
#> 2 /tmp/RtmpcLchkc/parade-registry/parade-82f7518a
# }
